subject: Fashion
title: Rei Kawakubo and Deconstruction
description: A short lesson to help you apply Rei Kawakubo and Deconstruction.

hook.text: In 1981, Rei Kawakubo showed torn, asymmetric clothes in Paris. Critics called it 'Hiroshima chic.'

discovery.text: Kawakubo treated fashion as a philosophical question. What if beauty could exist in imperfection?

climax.text: Kawakubo proved fashion can challenge perception as powerfully as any art hanging in a gallery.

punchline.text: She didn't design clothes. She designed questions.

quiz.question: How did the fashion press initially react to Kawakubo's Paris debut?
options: They reacted with hostility, calling it 'Hiroshima chic'
They praised it as the most innovative collection in decades
